addImplementation(address).details: marks a deployed contract as a suitable implementation for additional cohort formats

params.implementation: the contract address for new cohort format logic

changeHatsContract(address).details: Points to a new Hats Protocol implementation Only callable by the wearer of the default admin role's hat Emits a {RoleAdminChanged} event.

createCohort((address,address,address,ad.details: Deploys a new clone proxy instance for cohort staking

params.implementationSelector: points to a logic contract implementation
params.initData: the complete data for initializing a new cohort

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,uint256).details: Grants `role` to `hat`. If `hat` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must wear ``role``'s hat's admin hat. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`, based on the account wearing the correct hat.

revokeRole(bytes32,uint256).details: Revokes `role` from `hat`. If `hat` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must wear ``role``'s hat's admin hat.

documentation.text:
@dev marks a deployed contract as a suitable implementation for additional cohort formats
 @param implementation the contract address for new cohort format logic
